price: 65. Mereka berkata, “Wahai Musa! Apakah engkau yang melemparkan (dahulu) atau kami yang lebih dahulu melemparkan?”
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنۡ أَلۡقَىٰ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna awwala man alqā
